divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting outside looking up at the stars, my boyfriend at the time pointed,and said, hey, would you look at that I didnt see the object right away, so hegrabbed my finger and pointed to it..I then saw a spinning triangle juttingacross the sky stopping momentariy as its lights flashed all around it.. Theobject would stop in one direction, then jut across the night sky in straightlines, but in no defined direction.. My boyfriend and I were very taken by it,we ran into his house and asked his parents to come take a look, but they didntbelieve us, and continued watching TV.. Ill never forget what we saw, whether itbe a satellite, space station, etc.. HONEST TO GOD TRUTH..
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Monsey
There were no other sightings in Monsey on or around July 2nd 1977
